## Installation

You can install the development version of `imsb` from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

```r
# install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github(repo = "lnalborczyk/IMSB2022/_imsb", dependencies = TRUE)
```

## Example

Opening slides...

```{r example}
library(imsb)
open_slides(cours = 01)
```

Loading data...

```{r example}
data(tartine1)
```
